title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the names that will take part in the LIV Golf Tour. Will the PGA punish those players that decide to take part in the Saudi league? Adam Lefkoe calls in and brags about winning a Sports Emmy. And Mike Rodak checks in from SEC Summer meetings to share an update on the feud between Saban and Jimbo Fisher.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses the names that will take part in the LIV Golf Tour. Will the PGA punish those players that decide to take part in the Saudi league? Adam Lefkoe calls in and brags about winning a Sports Emmy. And Mike Rodak checks in from SEC Summer meetings to share an update on the feud between Saban and Jimbo Fisher.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
